Find a Doctor

Find a Doctor for Chicago Medical Cannabis

We recommend you start with your current doctor. But if your current doctor is reticent or unwilling to sign a certification, you can pursue treatment from another. Any Illinois physician licensed to write a prescription can sign the certification form.

A partial list of doctors we recommend is below:

Innovative Express Care

Innovative Express Care is located at 2400 N. Ashland at the northwest corner of Fullerton.

Milton Chavez

Dr. Milton Chavez is located at 2222 W Division St.

CMCA lists all interested physician and patient advocates free of charge. If you would like to be listed on this page please use the form on the About Us page to contact us.
